context:

response: As an AI language model developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow ethical guidelines, which include not promoting or engaging in harmful behavior, discrimination, or any form of hate speech. I am here to provide assistance, answer questions, and engage in positive and helpful conversations. If you need assistance with any other topic or have any other non-toxic request, feel free to ask and I'll be happy to help!
